name: Marius Jurgutis
note:
updated
Join the online meeting with Remote Helpers in Ukraine to uncover new pathways for maximizing the potential of Technology LT team and resources.

Website: rh-s.com

Company website: http://www.technology.lt

Comments: Marius Jurgutis

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/marius-jurgutis-00446a6)

The lead is interested in many positions that we do not have and I suggested a recruiter, the lead agreed. We need to tell more and discuss details.

Country-Location: Lithuania

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Immediate Requirement: Infrastructure Engineer; Application Engineer

Responsibilities for Infrastructure Engineer:

1. Administer, maintain, configure and operate infrastructure related components, such as switches, routers, Juniper network, DELL blade servers, Linux based virtual machines, Sonicwall firewall, internet connectivity, Dell EMC storages, backups, etc. 

2. Securing, troubleshooting, fixing, updating and upgrading Operating systems, firmware, infrastructure related tools and applications (such as Zabbix, Proxmox), and fine-tuning performance. 

3. Maintain relationship with infrastructure vendors for licenses, support and maintenance. 

Responsibilities for Application Engineer:

1. Administer, maintain, configure and operate business enterprise related applications and databases, i.e., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Fusion Registry, ETL, Superset, Tableau, DKAN, Joget, Docker, Redis , Ansible , Django, Gunicorn, Tomcat, Nginx, Celery, Graylog, Flask, Sentry, AngularJS and SSL Keys, on a Linux based systems. 

2. Administer, troubleshoot, maintain and develop applications’ source code, written in Python, and Web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript and CSS. 

3. Fine-tune performance and assure adequate resources.

name: Aviel Siman-Tov
note:
Lior. Israel. She has two companies Door2Dor and FairFly. The remote employee she searches for FairFly that is a leading corporate travel data and analytics tool. FairFly provides corporate and TMC clients with industry-leading airfare price tracking, business travel policy, and supplier analytics as well as the world's first traveler well-being benchmarking tool. Lior is looking for someone who will help with searching in LG ( the main task is searching in Google and Linkedin names and emails and to put in an Excel table). They oriented on different huge companies and countries. The price first 3 months 500 after that 600 USD. She wants to try. Tomorrow will be the second call. I sent a CV and SA via email. We are waiting for Lior lawyers, when they checked the contract and will start cooperation/
(site - https://www.fairfly.com/   linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/company/fairfly/)

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(24.02.2021)

name: Dany Olier
note:
Interested in Lead Generation Manager.
we schedule a call at 5:30 pm GMT
dany@icdtranslation.com
kristina@icdtranslation.com

Company Name:  ICD Translation
Company Website: http://www.icdtranslation.com
Contact Person: Dany Olier
Product:  ICD provides us with multilingual versions of all of our technical content by using their end-to-end translation management, desktop publishing, and localization processes. Using the latest computer assisted translation tools, ICD maintains translation memories that shorten project cycles, and improve product consistency. ICD delivers accurate translation and localization of: operation and service manuals, software, marketing collateral, training, publications, and e-Learning content websites. In addition, ICD also provides interpretation, multimedia, and multilingual voiceover services.
Country-Location: UK
Target Audience: worldwide
Immediate Requirement: they need lead generator manager
Next Step: send all information about our company.
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.

name: Fabio Tempesta
note:
Company Name: INTRAIUS, (Legal Services) - http://intraius.com/ru/

Country - Location: Barcelona, Spain.

Contact Person: Fabio Tempesta, (CEO/Founder).

Product: Legal advice (lawyers) in Spain, Italy, Ukraine, Mexico, Russia.

Target Audience: B2C.

Immediate Requirement:
-Account Manager (Assistant for clients) - They are ready to teach everything to get into things.
Skills:
Empathy, languages, soft skills, proactivity, interest,
language priorities:
1) French, 2) Spanish, 3) English. (French without Spanish is ok also)

-SMM Manager (Content, advertisements). Community management, graph(not 100% necessary) and content creation.
Instagram, Facebook management, Google Ads.

Next Step: I'll send the presentation, Assistant, SMM, and Graph designers' CVs.

Next Contact Date: We'll decide on WhatsApp, possibly next week will be an interview.

FRESH RESULT
Company Name: INTRAIUS, (Legal Services) - http://intraius.com/ru/

Country - Location: Barcelona, Spain.

Contact Person: Fabio Tempesta, (CEO/Founder).

Product: Legal advice (lawyers) in Spain, Italy, Ukraine, Mexico, Russia.

Fabio needs a person who can manage different aspects. Somebody who has experience in Digital Marketing (work with Instagram, Social Media), able to help with Administrative work, Time management. Account manager. Somebody who contributes to write a content (copywriter), who can assist in managing clients. It should be a french speaking person. Multitasking person, good in public relations. 
We will keep in touch by email.

FRESH RESULT

We interviewed 1 candidate for INTRAIUS company.
     
Olena https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/olena-m/
They speak French all the interview. Fabio likes Olena but he need a time to think about.

Next step: keep in touch by WhatsApp
